overview:
Hans-Henrik Eriksen - CEO, Vecata Ltd. since 2003.

Previously Hans-Henrik Eriksen was Finance Director in Dandy Ltd., a company in the Bagger-Sorensen Group that was sold to Cadbury-Schweppes Plc. in 2002.

Prior to his employment in the Bagger-Sorensen Group Hans-Henrik Eriksen was Manager, accounting and taxes in Tele Danmark A/S (the Danish Telecom) for 6 years. Before this Hans-Henrik Eriksen worked as a Certified Public Accountant with Arthur Andersen for 7 years.

He has extensive experience in establishing companies as well as mergers and acquisitions.

Apart from a number of board positions in the Vecata portfolio Hans-Henrik Eriksen is also a board member in the FÃ¦rch Group.

Hans-Henrik Eriksen has a Masterâ€™s Degree in Accounting and Auditing from Aarhus School of Business (Aarhus University) and was registered as a chartered accountant in 1988.

hhe@vecata.com
